labels.HAPROXY_0_HTTP_FRONTEND_ACL:
acl path_count path_beg /count
  use_backend {backend} if path_count
  acl path_sum path_beg /sum
  use_backend {backend} if path_sum
  acl path_most_viewed path_beg /most-viewed
  use_backend {backend} if path_most_viewed
  acl path_segmentation path_beg /segmentation
  use_backend {backend} if path_segmentation
